segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying that plate like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely unaware of the water overflowing, the kids taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just so focused on that plate, it's frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are taking a risk, and she's not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's completely checked out, not present in the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of it soon and realizes what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR
